channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: After the assassination attempt, Trump gets a string of wins
item.description:
In the days after the assassination attempt, Donald Trump secured the Republican presidential nomination, announced his VP pick and had a legal case dismissed.

Judge Aileen Cannon, a Trump appointee, dismissed the entire federal case against the former president involving his handling of classified documents.

Consider This host Ailsa Chang spoke with NPR Justice Correspondent Carrie Johnson about the legal issues in the ruling and its implications.

For sponsor-free episodes of Consider This, sign up for Consider This+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org.

Email us at considerthis@npr.org.
item.content:encoded:
In the days after the assassination attempt, Donald Trump secured the Republican presidential nomination, announced his VP pick and had a legal case dismissed.

Judge Aileen Cannon, a Trump appointee, dismissed the entire federal case against the former president involving his handling of classified documents.

Consider This host Ailsa Chang spoke with NPR Justice Correspondent Carrie Johnson about the legal issues in the ruling and its implications.

For sponsor-free episodes of Consider This, sign up for Consider This+ via Apple Podcasts or at plus.npr.org.

Email us at considerthis@npr.org.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)

item.title: Former President Trump has chosen Ohio Sen. J.D. Vance as his running mate
item.description: Now officially the Republican nominee for president in 2024, former President Trump has chosen Ohio Sen. J.D. Vance to be his running mate. Vance has been in the Senate just two years.
item.content:encoded: Now officially the Republican nominee for president in 2024, former President Trump has chosen Ohio Sen. J.D. Vance to be his running mate. Vance has been in the Senate just two years.
item.dc:creator: Don Gonyea

item.title: Judge dismisses Trump classified docs case
item.description: A federal judge appointed by former President Trump has dismissed the classified documents case against him after finding the prosecutor was unconstitutionally appointed.
item.content:encoded: A federal judge appointed by former President Trump has dismissed the classified documents case against him after finding the prosecutor was unconstitutionally appointed.
item.dc:creator: Carrie Johnson

item.title: Politically-motivated attacks are an issue for democracies around the world
item.description: Across the world, people are looking in horror at the rise of political violence in the U.S. But many international leaders have also fallen prey to political extremism.
item.content:encoded: Across the world, people are looking in horror at the rise of political violence in the U.S. But many international leaders have also fallen prey to political extremism.
item.dc:creator: Jackie Northam

item.title: 6 years after sexual abuse scandal, USA Gymnastics has a new generation of leaders
item.description: Six years ago, USA Gymnastics was on the brink of collapse after a sexual abuse scandal. Now, a new generation of leadership is trying to steer the organization in a new direction.
item.content:encoded: Six years ago, USA Gymnastics was on the brink of collapse after a sexual abuse scandal. Now, a new generation of leadership is trying to steer the organization in a new direction.
item.dc:creator: Becky Sullivan

item.title: There’s an ongoing battle happening at the highest level of motor sports
item.description: Former race car driver and legendary team owner Michael Andretti wants to join the prestigious Formula 1 series. But F1 rejected his bid. And the U.S. Congress is questioning why.
item.content:encoded: Former race car driver and legendary team owner Michael Andretti wants to join the prestigious Formula 1 series. But F1 rejected his bid. And the U.S. Congress is questioning why.
item.dc:creator: Quinn Klinefelter

item.title: FBI focuses on alleged gunman’s cell phone in Trump assassination attempt probe
item.description: Over the past 48 hours, federal agents have been racing to try to understand what led the 20-year-old alleged gunman to try to assassinate the former president.
item.content:encoded: Over the past 48 hours, federal agents have been racing to try to understand what led the 20-year-old alleged gunman to try to assassinate the former president.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Lucas

item.title: After chaos at the stadium, Argentina defeated Colombia at the Copa America final
item.description: NPR's Juana Summers talks with ESPN's Luis Miguel Echegaray about last night’s face off between Argentina and Colombia in the Copa America final.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Juana Summers talks with ESPN's Luis Miguel Echegaray about last night’s face off between Argentina and Colombia in the Copa America final.
item.dc:creator: Alejandra Marquez Janse

item.title: Spain takes it all in soccer and tennis
item.description: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks with Miguel Macias about Spain winning the European soccer championship and what this means for the country and soccer.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Ailsa Chang talks with Miguel Macias about Spain winning the European soccer championship and what this means for the country and soccer.
item.dc:creator: Jordan-Marie Smith

item.title: Is this a tipping point? Historians weigh in on the assassination attempt on Trump
item.description: The assassination attempt on former President Trump marks one of the most serious incidents of political violence in the U.S. in recent memory. It also calls to mind similar moments in the past.
item.content:encoded: The assassination attempt on former President Trump marks one of the most serious incidents of political violence in the U.S. in recent memory. It also calls to mind similar moments in the past.
item.dc:creator: Sarah McCammon
